attributes.action: Change the present laws regarding contracts of employment so that employers can't simply change them by degree or stealth or just give so many weeks notice,At present they are nothing less than a license to enslave because they are so one sided that they do not allow individuals themselves to simply say no, you cant change the contract as it stands without some compensation or increase in wages or terms and conditions.!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is long overdue and vital to all people that work for employers. As things are at present an employer can simply change a contract by stealth or manipulate compliant Unions or simply slowly change an individuals contract on an individual basis so that it does not affect the majority in the Union or causes no significant conflicting occasion.
All they have to say at present is that the change is necessary and needed to advance and improve the service. This is an all encompassing get-out-clause because it gives ultimate power to the most powerful side of the contract (i.e the Employer)
